name: Men's Humboldt Bay Windblocker Jacket
description:
Sales Tax Included
Spend more time on Humboldt's bays and beaches. This jacket insulates and stops the heaviest of winds. The fleece lined interior and pockets makes it comfortable and tough. Rain-resistant windblocking exterior with a micro fleece interior. Style: Active | Modern Color: Black Note: Women's sleeves run long for comfort Sizing (in inches): Men M L XL XXL Length 26 28 30 30 Chest 46 48 50 52 Shoulder 20 21 22 22.5 Sleeve 33 34 35 35 Waist 41 45 49 52 Hip 41 45 49 52 For a limited time only, purchase this jacket and receive a FREE pass for a Redwood Canopy Tour. “The jacket has great fit & performance for being outdoors in nature and stylish enough to wear for an evening out in town.” - Marna Powell, Owner Kayak Zak’s | Orick, CA

name: Men's Sequoia Down Vest
description:
Sales Tax Included
With over 90% goose-down, this vest is light but warming for those sunny and cool Humboldt winter days. Quality and warmth tested on Mount Everest, we stand by its warmth and durability. Nylon exterior shell with goose down filling. Style: Active | Modern Color: Black Sizing (in inches): Mens M L XL XXL Length 26 28 30 30 Chest 47 49 51 53 Shoulder 19 20 21 21.5 Waist 47 49 51 53 Hip 47 49 51 53 Womens S M L XL Length 24 26 28 28 Chest 41 43 45 47 Shoulder 17 18 19 19.5 Waist 38 40 42 44 Hip 42 44 46 48 For a limited time only, purchase this vest and receive a FREE pass for a Redwood Canopy Tour. “I ́m especially happy with the down vest...so cozy against the cold!” - Alegria Sita Amor, Freelance Outdoor Facilitator | World Traveler

name: Basecamp Windblocker Vest
description:
Sales Tax Included
This warm and windblocking vest is a great addition to any outdoor enthusiasts collection. It's fitted form is stylish and useful as layer or on its own. Rain-resistant windblocking exterior with a micro fleece interior. Style: Athletic | Modern Color: Black Sizing (in inches): Mens M L XL XXL Length 26 28 30 30 Chest 46 48 50 52 Shoulder 20 21 22 22.5 Waist 41 45 49 52 Hip 41 45 49 52 Sizing (in inches): Womens S M L XL Length 24 26 28 28 Chest 40 42 44 46 Shoulder 16 17 18 19 Waist 36 38 40 42 Hip 40 42 44 46 “This is a good solid layer to wear around the property, fishing, or camping” - Michael Charlton | Owner, Redwoods & Rivers Rafting Company | Del Loma, CA
